query.title: Query to retrieve contact details from a URL
query.description: Text query to search for contact details and potentially deduplicate them.
query.prefill: I would like to get contact details from apify.com

modelName.title: OpenAI model (currently the only supported provider)
modelName.description: Specify the LLM for orchestration and summarization. Currently supports OpenAI models with varying capabilities and performance.

llmProviderApiKey.title: LLM Provider API key (OpenAI is the only supported provider now)
llmProviderApiKey.description: API key for accessing a Large Language Model.
